seekers.about:
## About Me

Passionate full-stack developer with a strong focus on secure coding practices. Active contributor to OWASP BLT project with experience in building scalable web applications.

## Experience Highlights

- Built and maintained security-focused web applications
- Contributed to OWASP BLT platform (GitHub: 50+ PRs merged)
- Led development of microservices architecture for fintech startup
- Published security research on modern web vulnerabilities

## Contact & Links

**GitHub:** https://github.com/alexjohnson
**LinkedIn:** https://linkedin.com/in/alexjohnson
**Email:** alex.johnson@example.com

## What I'm Looking For

Looking for a senior full-stack role at a security-focused company where I can contribute to meaningful open source projects. Particularly interested in positions that involve OWASP projects or security tooling.

seekers.name: Jane Doe

seekers.about:
## About

I am a security engineer focused on helping teams build and ship secure applications without slowing them down. I enjoy collaborating with developers, improving tooling, and making security approachable.

## Highlights

- Led application security program for a multi-team engineering org
- Built internal security champions program
- Comfortable with cloud-native stacks (AWS, Kubernetes)
